summary: Diff implements age-group routing/guards, restores Age Select cards, applies pastel theme tokens + non-bold defaults, restores Mascot component with animation classes and graceful fallback, and adds a StickerBoard component with slot grid + per-sticker image fallback. However, the required sticker-board background image asset is not present in the diff, and Progress hides the sticker-board entirely when no stickers are earned (conflicts with requirement to show empty slots).

missing_requirements.requirement: The Progress area includes a sticker-board UI that displays earned stickers placed into board slots in earned order (with empty slots visible when not yet earned).
missing_requirements.reason: ProgressPage conditionally renders the StickerBoard only when earnedStickers.length > 0, so users with zero stickers will not see the board or empty slots.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide the required static image asset: sticker-board-bg.dim_1200x800.png served from frontend/public/assets/generated.
missing_requirements.reason: StickerBoard references /assets/generated/sticker-board-bg.dim_1200x800.png, but no new image/static asset file addition is shown in the diff summary.
